Instal Instal composer: compos requir forxer/laravel-gravatar Usag way use library: gravatar() helper fonction facad Gravatar::create() inject Laravelgravatar\gravatar servic way return instanc Laravelgravatar\gravatar service. Gravatar servic 3 main method: image() return instanc Laravelgravatar\imag wich extend Gravatar\imag forxer/gravatar avatar() alia profile() return instanc Laravelgravatar\profil wich extend Gravatar\profil forxer/gravatar instanc Laravelgravatar\imag Laravelgravatar\profil allow defin specif settings/paramet needed. use build Gravatar images/profil Url. method use, use url() method retriev it. display Url direct implement __tostring() method. Retriev instanc helper $gravatar = gravatar(); // Laravelgravatar\gravatar instanc $avatar = gravatar(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\imag instanc $avatar = gravatar()->image(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\imag instanc $avatar = gravatar()->avatar(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\imag instanc $profil = gravatar()->profile(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\profil instanc facade: use Laravelgravatar\facades\gravatar; $gravatar = Gravatar::create(); // Laravelgravatar\gravatar instanc $avatar = Gravatar::image(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\imag instanc $avatar = Gravatar::avatar(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\imag instanc $profil = Gravatar::profile(email@example.com); // Laravelgravatar\profil instanc servic injection: use App\models\user; use Laravelgravatar\gravatar Gravatar; class Usercontrol { public function show(us $user, Gravatar $gravatar) { $avatar = $gravatar->avatar($user->email); $profil = $gravatar->profile($user->email); } } direct view <img src="{{ gravatar(email@example.com) }}"> <img src="{{ Gravatar::avatar(email@example.com) }}"> <img src="{{ $avatar }}"> ^ Mandatori paramet Obvious email address mandatori paramet enter differ ways. // pass argument helper $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); // use `setemail()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar(); $gravatarimage->setemail($email); // `email()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar(); $gravatarimage->email($email); previous exampl valid profile. ^ Option paramet exampl use helper obvious work facad depend inject service. Gravatar imag size default, imag present 80px 80px size paramet supplied. request specif imag size, dynam deliv Gravatar. request imag 1px 2048px, note user lower resolut images, request larger size result pixelation/low-qu images. avatar size integ repres size pixels. // use `setsize()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setsize(120); // `size()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->size(120); // alia `s()` (as generat queri string) $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->s(120); ^ Default Gravatar imag happen email address match Gravatar imag gravatar specifi exceed maximum allow content rating? default, this: youd prefer use default image, easili suppli Url image. addit allow use image, Gravatar number built option use defaults. work take request email hash use generat theme imag uniqu email address. use options, just pass follow keywords: 404: load imag associ email hash, instead return Http 404 (file Found) respons mp: (mystery-person) simple, cartoon-styl silhouet outlin person (doe vari email hash) identicon: geometr pattern base email hash monsterid: generat monster differ colors, faces, wavatar: generat face differ featur background retro: awesom generated, 8-bit arcade-styl pixel face robohash: generat robot differ colors, faces, blank: transpar Png imag // use `setdefaultimage()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setdefaultimage(mp); // `defaultimage()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->defaultimage(mp); // alia `d()` (as generat queri string) $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->d(mp); ^ Gravatar imag max rate Gravatar allow user self-rat imag indic imag appropri certain audience. default, g rate imag display unless indic like higher ratings. specifi follow rate request imag includ rating: g: suitabl display websit audienc type. pg: contain rude gestures, provoc dress individuals, lesser swear words, mild violence. r: contain thing harsh profanity, intens violence, nudity, hard drug use. x: contain hardcor sexual imageri extrem disturb violence. // use `setmaxrating()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setmaxrating(g); // `maxrating()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->maxrating(g); // alia `r()` (as generat queri string) $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->r(g); ^ Gravatar imag file-typ extens requir file-typ extens (some place do) specifi it. specifi follow extens generat Url: jpg jpeg gif png webp // use `setextension()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setextension(jpg); // `extension()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->extension(jpg); // alia `e()` (as generat queri string) $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->e(jpg); ^ Forc use default imag reason want forc default imag load, it: // use `setforcedefault()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setforcedefault(true); // `forcedefault()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->forcedefault(true); // alia `f()` (as generat queri string) $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->f(true); // use `enableforcedefault()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setforcedefault(true); check forc default image, method forcingdefault() Laravelgravatar\image, return boolean valu regard forc default enabled. $gravatarimag = gravatar(); $gravatarimage->enableforcedefault(); //... $gravatarimage->forcingdefault(); // true //... $gravatarimage->disableforcedefault(); //... $gravatarimage->forcingdefault(); // fals ^ Combin combin seamlessly: $avatar = gravatar(email@example.com) ->size(120) ->rating(pg) ->defaultimage(robohash) ->extension(jpg); ^ Imag preset possibl defin group default parameters, known presets. help standard set use application. configur file, defin gravatar preset wish default preset used. First, publish config file packag use artisan: php artisan vendor:publish --tag="gravatar-config" defin preset configur file preset array. predefin preset exampl configur file, cours free delet defin one suit needs. example: my_default => [ size => 80, default_imag => mp, max_rat => g, extens => webp, ], small => [ size => 40, extens => jpg, ], medium => [ size => 120, extens => jpg, ], larg => [ size => 360, default_imag => robohash, max_rat => pg, ], configur file, valu key name, array key follow name conventions, use either: size s default_imag d max_rat r extens e force_default f wish default preset configur file. default_preset => my_default, Then, use applic second argument: $gravatarimag = gravatar($email, small); $gravatarimag = gravatar()->image($email, medium); $gravatarimag = Gravatar::image($email, large); set later instantiation: // use `setpreset()` method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->setpreset(small); // `preset()` helper method $gravatarimag = gravatar($email); $gravatarimage->preset(small); ^ Cast Let imagin user model column "gravatar" repres email use. cast attribut direct obtain instanc Laravelgravatar\image: use Laravelgravatar\casts\gravatarimage; class Post extend Model { protect $cast = [ gravatar => Gravatarimage::class, ]; } easi access instanc manipul it: use App\models\user; class Usercontrol { public function show(us $user) { $user->gravatar->preset(small); return view(users.show, [ user => $user, ]); } } defin preset use cast append cast: use Laravelgravatar\casts\gravatarimage; class Post extend Model { protect $cast = [ gravatar => Gravatarimage::class.:small, ]; } cast instanc Laravelgravatar\profile: use Laravelgravatar\casts\gravatarprofile; class Post extend Model { protect $cast = [ gravatar => Gravatarprofile::class, ]; } ^ Easi Gravatar integr Laravel project.
